title: Custom Elements Demo
description: This is a demo of all the Custom Element currently available Kendraio App

videoViewer.description: Embeds a YouTube Video on a form

money.description: Uses a mask to aid correct entry of an amount of money

countries.title: Country List

selectaddnew.title: Custom Select allowing new item to be added
